title: Poolparty Urgot
body:
There are so many cool poolpartyskins. But what i think lol needs is a Poolparty urgot skin, that would be so awsome. what do you guys think?xd
{{champion:6}}

replies.body: in german forum are only 2 topics allowed :bier and sauerkraut
would be ugly xD thats kind of fun
Isnt there already a crab urgot? He should fit to the summertheme.
